about.text: Hello there! I`m Wellington Silva. Web developer with over 5 years of experience specializing in fullstack development. Experienced with agile/scrum and great team worker. Having an in-depth knowledge including advanced HTML5, CSS3, STYLUS, JSON, XML, JavaScript, JQuery, VueJs, Angular Js, and also NodeJs with KoaJs and Express. Background in leadership and software architecture.
